title: Cate Blanchett Swears On Australian TV; Flap Ensues
teaser: When Cate Blanchett was interviewed about her role in Cinderella last week, the interview came to an abrupt end with some inappropriate language. Oh, my! What would Prince Charming think?
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
